Class Region

  • java.lang.Object
    • starvationevasion.sim.AbstractTerritory

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Territory>

    public class Region
extends AbstractTerritory
    Region class extends AbstractAgriculturalUnit, includes methods for accessing its fields.
